CustomField.defaultValue: "• Searching BE Cases, Knowledge Articles, Problem Reports and ECNs for information" +BR() &"• Part Number" +BR() &"• Detailed description of issue" +BR() &"• If wiring issue, describe customer wiring in detail" +BR() &"• If packaging issue, provide photos" +BR() &"• If documentation issue, provide exact document name and page number (screen caps are better)"+BR() &"• If applicable, provide project files or configuration files associated with all case related devices." +BR() &"• If Ethernet communication issue: Provide network settings (IP Address, Subnet Mask, and Default Gateway) of all case related devices." +BR() &"• If Ethernet communication issue: Obtain network topology diagram; even if simple hand drawing." +BR() &"• If Serial communication issue: Obtain network diagram, protocol, baud rate, parity and node address." +BR() &"• Have you duplicated problem?"+BR() &"• Ask other Techs and Tech Lead first"
CustomField.label: Standard BE Information
